_header: O mighty Mars that marreth many a wight
Versification: — mixed couplets and cross-rhymes quatrains — aa, abab
_description: A Prophecy — 76 lines in irregular stanzas

CULKk616.First Lines:
O myghty mars that marrith many a wightVndre thy baner rede as
                    rubyis rich…
CULKk616.Last Lines:
…The gilt shal be restored wote I weleBy the sonne and the
                    mone euery dele
